title: Editor-Approved Espadrille Sneakers for Effortless Summer Style
text: Adidas x CLOT Gazelle SneakersIf you’re fatigued by your old stash of Adidas sneakers, it’s time to shop this fun collab that mixes jute with beaded details.Keds Triple Up Canvas Jute Foxing Lace UpI adore platform sneakers, and this affordable pair from Keds is so chic. The multicolored jute rope will blend in seamlessly with all of your summer ensembles. Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowChloé Telma SneakersSpeaking of mixing materials, denim shoes are having quite a moment. Grab Chloé’s jute-trimmed version to go with all of your summer dresses.Dolce Vita Notice Espadrille SneakersHere you’ll find texture on top of texture in this unique take on the espadrille sneaker trend.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowCeline Lace-Up EspadrilleA little logo love never hurts, especially when it comes courtesy of Celine’s iconic triomphe symbol.Malone Souliers x Tabitha Simmons Tyler EspadrillesLean into the joys of the season with nautical stripes paired next to a jute-trimmed sole.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowTretorn Nylite Canvas SneakersClassic lovers, count on Tretorn’s timeless silhouettes to go perfectly with your favorite jeans or breezy linen pants.Lauren Ralph Lauren Luize SneakersStep into your coastal girl era with this monochromatic take on the craft-inspired sneaker.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowPenelope Chilvers Spring Platform EspadrilleFor added height, step into this stacked heel option by England-based brand Penelope Chilvers.Free People Chapmin Espadrille SneakerWith a mix of creamy neutrals and jumbo laces, this is the sweet sneaker to add to your collection of playful kicks.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowMaison Margiela Canvas Espadrille SneakersWith perfectly distressed details Maison Margiela makes the espadrille sneaker look cooler than ever.JW Anderson Suede Espadrille Platform SneakerJW Anderson brings the moody vibes with a deep taupe option that easily mixes and matches with any hue in your closet.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowRag & Bone Retro Espadrille SneakersIf you love the look of sleek sneakers that gently hug your feet, Rag & Bone’s low-profile design is what you need.Toms Carolina Lace-Up Platform Espadrille SneakerWith thick laces and a summery jute trim, this is the sneaker that deserves a spot in your luggage this summer.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowSuperga Unisex SneakerAmazon always has a wonderful selection of footwear—often at a reasonable price. This pair of platformed pink Superga sneakers are fantastic for all your spring outings. Why Trust ELLEEvery product featured on ELLE.com is independently researched, tested, or editor-approved. html:
Adidas x CLOT Gazelle Sneakers

If you’re fatigued by your old stash of Adidas sneakers, it’s time to shop this fun collab that mixes jute with beaded details.

Keds Triple Up Canvas Jute Foxing Lace Up

I adore platform sneakers, and this affordable pair from Keds is so chic. The multicolored jute rope will blend in seamlessly with all of your summer ensembles.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Chloé Telma Sneakers

Speaking of mixing materials, denim shoes are having quite a moment. Grab Chloé’s jute-trimmed version to go with all of your summer dresses.

Dolce Vita Notice Espadrille Sneakers

Here you’ll find texture on top of texture in this unique take on the espadrille sneaker trend.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Celine Lace-Up Espadrille

A little logo love never hurts, especially when it comes courtesy of Celine’s iconic triomphe symbol.

Malone Souliers x Tabitha Simmons Tyler Espadrilles

Lean into the joys of the season with nautical stripes paired next to a jute-trimmed sole.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Tretorn Nylite Canvas Sneakers

Classic lovers, count on Tretorn’s timeless silhouettes to go perfectly with your favorite jeans or breezy linen pants.

Lauren Ralph Lauren Luize Sneakers

Step into your coastal girl era with this monochromatic take on the craft-inspired sneaker.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Penelope Chilvers Spring Platform Espadrille

For added height, step into this stacked heel option by England-based brand Penelope Chilvers.

Free People Chapmin Espadrille Sneaker

With a mix of creamy neutrals and jumbo laces, this is the sweet sneaker to add to your collection of playful kicks.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Maison Margiela Canvas Espadrille Sneakers

With perfectly distressed details Maison Margiela makes the espadrille sneaker look cooler than ever.

JW Anderson Suede Espadrille Platform Sneaker

JW Anderson brings the moody vibes with a deep taupe option that easily mixes and matches with any hue in your closet.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Rag & Bone Retro Espadrille Sneakers

If you love the look of sleek sneakers that gently hug your feet, Rag & Bone’s low-profile design is what you need.

Toms Carolina Lace-Up Platform Espadrille Sneaker

With thick laces and a summery jute trim, this is the sneaker that deserves a spot in your luggage this summer.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Superga Unisex Sneaker

Amazon always has a wonderful selection of footwear—often at a reasonable price. This pair of platformed pink Superga sneakers are fantastic for all your spring outings.

Why Trust ELLE

Every product featured on ELLE.com is independently researched, tested, or editor-approved. We only recommend products that we stand behind, and the merchandise featured on our site is always driven by editorial and product testing standards, not by affiliate deals or advertising relationships. Any content created in partnership with advertisers is marked as such.
